article.title: Mythics Supports WIN-T Program Office
article.text: Mythics Incorporated, Virginia Beach, Virginia, was awarded an $11,041,269 modification (KX02) to contract W91QUZ-06-A-0003 to act under license from Oracle to provide Program Manager Warfighter Information Network-Tactical (WIN-T) software maintenance and support. The Army Contracting Command, Aberdeen, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
